name: .QIC File Extension
summary: Learn about .QIC files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: Backup file created by the backup utility included with Windows 95 and 98; saved in the QIC-113 format; contains a collection of files in a compressed archive that are expanded when restored using the Windows Backup program.

content: QIC files can also be opened by Roxio's "Backup My PC" software. However, Roxio no longer offers this product.
NOTE: The QIC file format is not compatible with the Windows XP, Vista, and Windows 7 backup and restore utilities.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
